mapper.select:
SELECT t1.CONFIG_ID, t1.APP_ID, t1.CHANNEL_ID, t1.PROVINCE_ID, t1.PIPLE_ID,t1.CONFIG_VALUE,t2.APP_NAME,t3.FULL_NAME CHANNEL_NAME,t4.PROVINCE_NAME, t3.API_KEY,t5.PIPLE_NUMBER,t5.PIPLE_NAME FROM (SELECT CONFIG_ID, APP_ID, CHANNEL_ID, PROVINCE_ID,PIPLE_ID, CONFIG_VALUE FROM t_sdkconfig_cross) t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT APP_ID,APP_NAME FROM t_sdk_app ) t2 ON (t1.APP_ID = t2.APP_ID) LEFT JOIN (SELECT CHANNEL_ID,FULL_NAME,API_KEY FROM t_channel) t3 ON (t1.CHANNEL_ID = t3.CHANNEL_ID) LEFT JOIN (SELECT PROVINCE_ID,PROVINCE_NAME FROM t_province) t4 ON (t1.PROVINCE_ID = t4.PROVINCE_ID) LEFT JOIN (SELECT PIPLE_ID,PIPLE_NUMBER,PIPLE_NAME FROM t_piple) t5 ON (t1.PIPLE_ID = t5.PIPLE_ID) WHERE 1=1
AND (t1.APP_ID = #{sdkconfigCross.appId} OR t1.APP_ID IS NULL OR t1.APP_ID = '')
AND (t1.CHANNEL_ID = #{sdkconfigCross.channelId} OR t1.CHANNEL_ID IS NULL OR t1.CHANNEL_ID = '')
AND (t1.PROVINCE_ID = #{sdkconfigCross.provinceId} OR t1.PROVINCE_ID IS NULL OR t1.PROVINCE_ID = '')
AND (t1.PIPLE_ID = #{sdkconfigCross.pipleId} OR t1.PIPLE_ID IS NULL OR t1.PIPLE_ID = '')
AND t1.CONFIG_ID = #{sdkconfigCross.configId}
LIMIT #{start},#{end}

SELECT count(*) FROM t_sdkconfig_cross WHERE 1=1
AND (APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR APP_ID IS NULL OR APP_ID = '')
AND (CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR CHANNEL_ID IS NULL OR CHANNEL_ID = '')
AND (PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR PROVINCE_ID IS NULL OR PROVINCE_ID = '')
AND (PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR PIPLE_ID IS NULL OR PIPLE_ID = '')
AND CONFIG_ID = #{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from t_sdkconfig_cross where 1=1
AND (APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR APP_ID IS NULL OR APP_ID = '')
AND (CHANNEL_ID = #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR CHANNEL_ID IS NULL OR CHANNEL_ID = '')
AND (PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR PROVINCE_ID IS NULL OR PROVINCE_ID = '')
AND (PIPLE_ID = #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR PIPLE_ID IS NULL OR PIPLE_ID = '')
AND CONFIG_ID = #{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_sdkconfig_cross (CONFIG_ID, APP_ID, CHANNEL_ID, PROVINCE_ID, PIPLE_ID,CONFIG_VALUE) values (#{configId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pipleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_sdkconfig_cross
CONFIG_ID,
APP_ID,
CHANNEL_ID,
PROVINCE_ID,
PIPLE_ID,
CONFIG_VALUE,
